Class DialogController

java.lang.Object
  DialogController

public class DialogController
extends java.lang.Object

Connects an administrator dialog view to a runtime database to allow for back end updates.

Version:
1.0 03/20/2013
Author:
Sophi Newman

public void createNewAffiliation(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String dollars,
                                 java.lang.String cents,
                                 boolean subsidyOn)
Attempts to add a new affiliation to the database.

Parameters:
name - the name of the affiliation to be added
dollars - the string representing the dollars of credit to be allotted
cents - the string representing the cents of credit to be allotted
subsidyOn - whether this affiliation receives a free pregnancy test
